name: Candy Switch
description:
Big fan of sweet candy puzzle games? Switch candies to make sweet lines of 3 to create candy blasts! There are splendid new candies and booster are waiting for you to explore.
Come and go switching!

Why should you choose Candy Switch
• Objectives differ in 240 stunning levels
• Rich visual graphics and in-game experience
• Multiple gameplay: time mode, move mode, and more will be coming out
• Journey through 5 brand new maps
• Create a high score in your friends circle
• Addictive and classic match 3 gameplay
• Never ending fun for all ages

Discover the bright and fun levels in Candy Switch for FREE now!!!
